name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Saver - Manage and real-time sync your unclosed tabs

short.ar: إدارة ومزامنة علامات التبويب غير المغلقة في الوقت الفعلي، مع ميزات تشمل الفتح والنسخ والإغلاق والبحث والمزامنة.
short.am,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Manage and real-time sync your unclosed tabs, with features including opening, copying, closing, searching, and syncing.
short.bn: আপনার খোলা ট্যাবগুলি রিয়েল-টাইমে পরিচালনা এবং সিঙ্ক করুন, খোলা, কপি, বন্ধ, অনুসন্ধান এবং সিঙ্ক করার বৈশিষ্ট্যগুলি সহ।
short.de: Verwalten und synchronisieren Sie Ihre nicht geschlossenen Tabs in Echtzeit, mit Funktionen wie Öffnen, Kopieren, Schließen, Suchen…
short.es: Administra y sincroniza en tiempo real tus pestañas no cerradas, con funciones que incluyen abrir, copiar, cerrar, buscar y…
short.fr: Gérez et synchronisez en temps réel vos onglets non fermés, avec des fonctionnalités incluant l'ouverture, la copie, la fermeture,…
short.hi: अपने खुले टैब्स को रीयल-टाइम में प्रबंधित और सिंक करें, खोलने, कॉपी करने, बंद करने, खोजने और सिंक करने जैसी सुविधाओं के साथ।
short.ja: 開いているタブをリアルタイムで管理・同期し、開く、コピー、閉じる、検索、同期などの機能を提供します。
short.ru: Управляйте и синхронизируйте в реальном времени незакрытые вкладки, с функциями открытия, копирования, закрытия, поиска и…

long.ar,bn,de,es,fr,hi,ja,ru:
Tab Saver is a powerful tab management tool that focuses on solving a common problem in modern web browsing: how to efficiently manage and synchronize multiple open tabs. Here are the main features and values of this extension:

Real-time Tab Synchronization:
Automatically tracks and saves all unclosed tabs
Updates synchronously in real-time to ensure the tab list is always current
Supports cross-device synchronization, allowing seamless switching between different devices
Smart Tab Management:
Provides an intuitive tab list interface
Supports batch operations: open or close multiple selected tabs simultaneously
Built-in search functionality for quickly locating needed tabs
One-click select-all feature for convenient batch operations
User-Friendly Design:
Supports light/dark theme switching, can automatically follow system settings
Multi-language interface support
Clean and intuitive operating interface
Customizable settings options
Why Users Should Install This Extension:

Improved Work Efficiency:
Avoid reopening the same tabs repeatedly
Quickly restore previous work environments
Save time in searching for specific tabs
Better Tab Organization:
Centralized management of all open tabs
Prevent loss of important tabs
Reduce browser memory usage
Cross-Device Collaboration:
Synchronize tabs across different devices
Ensure work continuity
Provide seamless multi-device experience
Personalized Experience:
Adapts to different usage habits
Supports dark mode for eye protection
Clean interface that doesn't interfere with normal browsing
This extension is particularly suitable for users who frequently need to handle multiple web pages simultaneously, such as researchers, developers, students, or professionals who need to reference numerous online materials. It effectively solves tab management pain points, improves work efficiency, and is a productivity tool worth installing.
